description: Banner displayed after an article is successfully sent to previous requests.
defaultMessage: Articles successfully scheduled to be delivered!

description: Message displayed in the confirmation dialog that appears when sending explainers to previous requests.
defaultMessage: You can deliver new articles to users who have previously submitted requests with this media, but did not receive a response.

description: Help content for the range select.
defaultMessage: {count, plural, one {Articles will be delivered to one user who have not received articles} other {Articles will be delivered to # users who have not received articles}}
Send to users who have not received a response

description: Label for the 24 hours option in the range select.
Label for the 7 days option in the range select.
Label for the 30 days option in the range select.
Message for the alert that is displayed when the selected range is not 24 hours.
defaultMessage: Reminder that messages send to users outside of the past 24 hours are considered <u>business initiated conversations</u> and may incur additional charges.

description: Title for the alert that is displayed when the selected range is not 24 hours.
Generic label for a button or link for a user to press when they wish to abort an in-progress operation
'Send' here is an infinitive verb. Label of the proceed button of the confirmation dialog that appears when sending explainers to previous requests.
Title of the confirmation dialog that appears when sending explainers to previous requests.
